definition[0]: if a shiny surface glints, it gives out small flashes of light
example[0]: The gold rims of his spectacles glinted in the sun.
definition[1]: if light glints off a surface, it shines back off it
example[1]: Sunlight glinted off the windows of a tall apartment building.
definition[2]: if your eyes glint, they shine and show an unfriendly feeling
definition[3]: a look in someoneâ€™s eyes which shows a particular feeling
example[2]: a humorous glint in her eyes
definition[4]: a flash of light from a shiny surface
